segments.text: I'm captivated by the woman's singular focus on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such meticulous care, almost reverently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she holds the dish towel, her posture, it speaks of routine and precision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the irony of her surroundings is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a single plate while her kitchen drowns.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me admires her dedication, even if it's misplaced in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the wide puddle, and it makes me quite annoyed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so dedicated to one thing and so oblivious to everything else?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a commentary on life itself, doesn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Focusing on the small details while the bigger picture unravels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope she finishes that plate before the water reaches her knees.
segments.speaker: PAR
